app_descript:
App Name: Farmish

Brief:

Farmish provides a platform for local farmers and gardeners to sell their goods directly to consumers. This app simplifies the process of connecting with local buyers, allowing sellers to bypass traditional farmer's market fees and wholesale distribution requirements. Whether you have an abundant harvest, a few extra dozen eggs, or surplus supplies, Farmish makes it easy to list and sell your products right from the comfort of your home.
